mapper.insert: insert into co_work(co_name, co_position, co_company, co_department, co_password, co_content) values (#{coName},#{coPosition},#{coCompany},#{coDepartment},#{coPassword},#{coContent})
mapper.select: select co_id,co_name,co_company,co_department,co_position,co_content from co_work where co_id = #{no} and co_password = #{pw};
